hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | xargs -I{} npx biome check --write {} 2>/dev/null

hooks.prompt: Run `git diff --name-only` to find changed files. If fewer than 5 files changed, respond with just 'No audit needed' and stop immediately. If 5+ files were changed, read each changed file and perform a quick code audit. Check for: (1) `any` types, (2) `as` type assertions, (3) empty `catch {}`, (4) `|| true` without comments, (5) unused imports, (6) string interpolation in shell commands, (7) secrets in logs, (8) copy-pasted code. Report findings by severity: BUG > SECURITY > SMELL > STYLE. Max 10 findings.
